name: Elevator inaction
description:
What is this?

This is an unfinished prototype from 2014 of an Elevator Action clone. It won't be finished anytime soon, so I'll leave it here in case someone finds it interesting. It breaks in many (and sometimes interesting) ways.

Goals

The goal of each level is to steal some documents and flee the building. 

Current state

You can steal the documents by entering the violet doors and after picking up the last documents the exit door (on the base floor) lights up. But there's no code to enter that door, well, there's no other level to go!

There was some code to have lights in the ceiling which could be shot at as well as using staircases to move between floors but didn't make it into this build.

The guards (too many) are completely unaware of their surroundings and don't bother if you start shooting at them.

Controls

  • left/right: move
  • down: kneel
  • down/up: inside the elevator: move down/up one floor
  • e: enter a document door
  • z: shoot

This is an unfinished prototype, there are a lot of bugs and a lot of functionality is missing.
